text: The 1991 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships were held in Barga, Italy from 15 to 16 September 1991. ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- |Cross- country | | | |- |Downhill | | | |- |Junior downhill | | | |} ===Women's events=== {| |- |Cross-country | | | |- |Downhill | | | |- |Junior downhill | | | |} ===Medal table=== ==References== ==External links== Category:UCI Mountain Bike World Championships Category:International cycle races hosted by Italy UCI Mountain Bike World Championships Category:Mountain biking events in Italy
title: 1991 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships
